title: Tea
content:
Hey, could anyone help me with the name of the fonts on the linked site please, or similar fonts that i could go by and hand draw.

[  
Tea font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023214916/http:/www.clipper-teas.com/)
author: Joe90

comments.content: There's a link on that site that says "Our new look." If you go to [that page](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023214916/http:/www.clipper-teas.com/our-new-look), there's another link where it says "We’d love to hear your opinions, so to tell us what you think." Why not use the response form to ask them what their font is?
